dict.acceptation: 害怕的；担心的；恐怕；畏惧，害怕；

sent.orig: Im afraid, I mn't afraid dead, just afraid times gone!
sent.trans: 我害怕，我害怕的不是死亡，而是一切的流逝！

sent.orig: I wasn't afraid ofthe car. I was afraid of the driver.
sent.trans: 我不是怕那辆车，而是怕那个开车的人。

sent.orig: Goliath is not afraid. He is very small but he is not afraid.
sent.trans: 格莱斯不害怕。他很小但他不害怕。

sent.orig: You're afraid, you bully, you're afraid, you know you are.
sent.trans: 你害怕了，你这个暴徒，你害怕了，你知道你害怕了。

sent.orig: We afraid to lose money, afraid we all make money not only earn their own.
sent.trans: 不怕大家一起亏钱，只怕大家都赚钱只有自己没赚到。
